thread.section_title: www.PromoDirect.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of www.PromoDirect.com | www.promodirect.com
thread.title: Ray Trotter

author: Ray Trotter
title: Ray Trotter
text: I haven't done business with promo director in a long time I'm at my salesperson I called you guys I told him who I was what I expected in what I expected of him and guess what he did exactly what I asked the quality was amazing it was just like it was the last time I done business with you people thank God some things stay the same and has not got disjointed with all of the electronic world we all have to remember we're still in the people business. The experience was great my salesperson was amazing and that's all I have to say right now.
